definition: no less than from heaven to the abyss (idiom); differing widely/worlds apart/the gap couldn't be bigger

sentences.english: You can share your experiences and ideas here and help make a world of difference.
sentences.chinese: 您可以分享您的經驗和想法在這裏和幫助是天淵之別。

sentences.english: First, the basic situation Shanxi jujube Co. , Ltd. is a great differences in joint-stock enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 基本情況山西天淵棗業有限公司屬股份制企業。

sentences.english: But now how different everything was!
sentences.chinese: 同現在相比，真是天淵之別。

sentences.english: The truth is , there is a huge difference between being confident and being conceited.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，自信與自大有着天淵之別。

sentences.english: What I thought previously is totally different from what reality presents.
sentences.chinese: 之前所想像的和實際情況有天淵之別。

sentences.english: There is a huge divide between the women in the cities and in the villages.
sentences.chinese: 而城市婦女和農村婦女的地位和待遇則有天淵之別。

definition: funds and provisions for the troops/(soldier's) pay
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
the war of 1904-1905 between Russia and Japan
North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
